Class ClientGameHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034.client.ClientGameHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ClientGameHandler
extends Object
implements Runnable
Message handler and sender. Communicates directly with RequestManager.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientGameHandler

      public ClientGameHandler​(RequestManager requestManager, BlockingQueue<Request> requestBlockingQueue, ObjectOutputStream out)
      Creates a new ClientGameHandler able to manage incoming request and to send them.
      Parameters:
      requestManager - CLI or GUI request manager.
      requestBlockingQueue - Incoming messages queue.
      out - Output message stream.

  • Method Details

    • setSilentEnded

      void setSilentEnded​(boolean silentEnded)
      Sets synchronously if client has ended silently (e.g. win/lose condition), therefore its disconnection should not be seen as an error.
      Parameters:
      silentEnded - true if client has ended silently, false otherwise.

    • isSilentEnded

      boolean isSilentEnded()
      Returns synchronously if client has ended (e.g. win/lose condition), therefore its disconnection should not be seen as an error.
      Returns:
      true if client has ended silently, false otherwise.

    • send

      public void send​(Answer message)
      Handles a single answer
      Parameters:
      message - Answer to the given request, null if the answer is not needed.

    • run

      public void run()
      Continuously takes message from queue and forwards them to associated RequestManager. Manages possible GameException or generic Exceptions.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
